org.mmbase.datatypes.processors

Class KeywordsProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.datatypes.processors.KeywordsProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventListener, NodeEventListener, Processor

    public class KeywordsProcessor
extends Object
implements Processor, NodeEventListener
    This processor can be used as a 'set' processor on keyword fields. It maintains then a count on all keywords. These counts are aquirable via the static method getKeywords(java.lang.String) (and via a function 'keywords' on the 'utils' set). Two properties can be set on this processor. The first one is the 'repository' which is a key with with to store the Map with the counts. This ensures that you can use this processor for different 'clouds' of keywords. The second one is the 'field', which is a String of the form <builder name>.<field name>. This information cannot be aquired automaticly because a field knows about it's datatype, but not inversely. It is essential to use this last property. 
    
      
        Sleutelwoorden
        Keywords
